name: Green General
detailed_description:
Update Notes

This is the first chapter of the game. There will be 3 or 4 chapters in the game and the additional chapters will come out as free updates.


About the Game

Follow Almeric as he goes on a journey guided by a mysterious figure. Complete Quests, meet other characters and fight monsters in turn-based battles. Fight against the demon lords and uncover your fate. In Green General you control a party of adventurers. You level up, collect better gear and collect items while uncovering the story and completing Side-Quests. You will explore the map, interact with characters and find treasures. When you encounter enemies the game will switch into the battle screen where you can choose between attacking, guarding, using a skill or using an item.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
